title: An idea for the Minions
body:
Minions are... Well... Minions! And they look awesome (Personal opinion). A thing i have noticed tho, is that the Minions aperence sometimes are different from the standard, due to events like, Stargurdians, Arcade, Snowday, Beach Party and so on. This (obviously) means that minions have skins.

The idea is wery simple really. Since You "in game" under the boss Battle event could turn the arcade look on and off, people had different looking Rifts in the same game. With all the minions different looks, Why not make it an option to BUY minion skins. Arcade Minions 500 RP or something. 

It's a simple yet great idea, that can make the Rift an even more awesome place.

Im SirTutter from EU West, and thank you for Reading this thread.
